AccountId.description: The unique ID of the account to which the campaign belongs.

CampaignId.description: The unique ID of the campaign.

TimePeriod.description: The time period for which the data is reported.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for monetary values.

AdDistribution.description: The distribution channels where the ads were displayed.

DeviceType.description: The type of device where the ad was displayed (e.g., mobile, desktop).

Network.description: The advertising network where the ad was displayed.

DeliveredMatchType.description: The type of match used for delivering ads.

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device where the ad was displayed.

TopVsOther.description: Comparison of the ad position with top vs. other placements.

BidMatchType.description: The type of bid matching used for the campaign.

AccountName.description: The name of the account to which the campaign belongs.

CampaignLabels.description: Any labels associated with the campaign.

Impressions.description: Total number of times the ad was displayed.

Clicks.description: Total number of clicks on the ad.

Spend.description: Total amount spent on the campaign.

QualityScore.description: The quality score of the ad.

AdRelevance.description: The relevance score of the ad in relation to the target audience.

LandingPageExperience.description: The landing page experience of the ad.

PhoneImpressions.description: Number of impressions on phone devices.

PhoneCalls.description: Number of phone calls generated by the ad.

Assists.description: Number of assists in the conversion process.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for conversions.

CostPerAssist.description: Average cost per assist in the conversion process.

CustomParameters.description: Any custom parameters associated with the campaign.

ViewThroughConversions.description: Number of view-through conversions generated by the ad.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The average cost per conversion for all conversion types.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions.

AllConversions.description: Total number of all types of conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: Conversion rate considering all types of conversions.

AllRevenue.description: Total revenue generated from all types of conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue generated per conversion for all conversion types.

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad in search results.

LowQualityClicks.description: Number of clicks categorized as low quality.

LowQualityClicksPercent.description: Percentage of clicks categorized as low quality.

LowQualityImpressions.description: Number of impressions categorized as low quality.

LowQualitySophisticatedClicks.description: Number of sophisticated clicks categorized as low quality.

LowQualityConversions.description: Number of conversions from low-quality clicks.

HistoricalQualityScore.description: Historical quality score of the ad.

RevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue generated per conversion.

RevenuePerAssist.description: Average revenue generated per assist in the conversion process.

BudgetName.description: The name of the budget associated with the campaign.

BudgetStatus.description: The status of the budget associated with the campaign.

BudgetAssociationStatus.description: The status of the campaign's budget association.
